Name: Standard Carrier Alpha Code
Remarks: MS301 is the Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC) of the interline carrier.

Name: Routing Sequence Code
Notes: Code describing the relationship of a carrier to a specific shipment movement

Name: City Name
Remarks: MS303 is the city where the interline was performed.

Name: Transportation Method/Type Code
Notes: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Name: State or Province Code
Notes: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
Remarks: C0503: If MS3-05 is present, then MS3-03 is required
